products.description: Behold the Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra smartphone, an exceptional amalgamation of incredible technology and superior sophistication. Whether you're typing up a storm or jotting something down, Note Assist makes a long story short. New AI-powered editing options let you get the photo you want, like relocating objects and intelligently filling in the space they left behind. With a durable shield of titanium built right into the frame and better scratch resistance with Corning Gorilla Armor, your IP68 water and dust-resistant Galaxy S24 Ultra is ready for adventure. Write, tap, and navigate with the precision your fingers wish they had on the new, flat display.
